When button is clicked, user is able to add customer information to database.
onActionAddCustomerCancelBtn(ActionEvent) - Method in class View_Controller.AddCustomerController
When button is clicked, this switches screen back to Customer table view list.
onActionApptAddBtn(ActionEvent) - Method in class View_Controller.ApptTableViewController
Add button enables user to add a new customer.
onActionApptBackBtn(ActionEvent) - Method in class View_Controller.ApptTableViewController
Back button enables user to go back to previous screen: Welcome screen.
onActionApptDeleteBtn(ActionEvent) - Method in class View_Controller.ApptTableViewController
Delete button enables user to delete current appointment selected.
onActionApptUpdateBtn(ActionEvent) - Method in class View_Controller.ApptTableViewController
Update button enables user to update appointment information for appointment selected from the table view list.
onActionCustomerAddBtn(ActionEvent) - Method in class View_Controller.CustomerTableViewController
When button is clicked, opens up Add Customer screen.
onActionCustomerBackBtn(ActionEvent) - Method in class View_Controller.CustomerTableViewController
Goes back to Welcome screen when clicked.
onActionCustomerDeleteBtn(ActionEvent) - Method in class View_Controller.CustomerTableViewController
When button is clicked, this will enable user to delete selected customer from table view list.
onActionCustomerUpdateBtn(ActionEvent) - Method in class View_Controller.CustomerTableViewController
When button is clicked, opens up Update Customer screen.
onActionExit(ActionEvent) - Method in class View_Controller.WelcomeController
Exit button terminates app.
onActionFilterAllBtn(ActionEvent) - Method in class View_Controller.ApptTableViewController
Radio button selected will list all scheduled appointments.
onActionFilterByMonthBtn(ActionEvent) - Method in class View_Controller.ApptTableViewController
Radio button selected will filter list to appointments scheduled only for current month.
onActionFilterByWeekBtn(ActionEvent) - Method in class View_Controller.ApptTableViewController
Radio button selected will filter list to appointments occurring for current week.
onActionLogIn(ActionEvent) - Method in class View_Controller.LogInController
This is the Log In button.
onActionShowAppointmentList(ActionEvent) - Method in class View_Controller.WelcomeController
Clicking on Appointments button will have program switch screens to Appointments table view list.
onActionShowCustomerList(ActionEvent) - Method in class View_Controller.WelcomeController
Clicking on Customers button will have program switch screens to Customers table view list.

onActionUpdateCustomerCancelBtn(ActionEvent) - Method in class View_Controller.UpdateCustomerController
